properties.description: This is the S51 advice curated table for ODT consumption

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_s51_advice

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT

    AD.adviceId,
    AD.adviceReference ,
    CASE
        WHEN AD.caseId = 'None'
        THEN CAST("-1" as INT)
        ELSE AD.caseId
    END                                                     AS caseId,
    AD.caseReference,
    AD.title,
    AD.titleWelsh,
    AD.from,
    CASE
        WHEN LOWER(AD.agent) = 'none'
        THEN NULL
        ELSE AD.agent
    END                                                     AS agent,
    CASE 
        WHEN LOWER(AD.method) = 'none'
        THEN NULL
        ELSE LOWER(AD.method)
        END                                                 AS method,
    AD.enquiryDate,
    AD.enquiryDetails,
    AD.enquiryDetailsWelsh,
    AD.adviceGivenBy,
    AD.adviceDate,
    AD.adviceDetails,
    AD.adviceDetailsWelsh,
    CASE
        WHEN AD.status IN ('Not Checked','unchecked','Depublished')
        THEN "unchecked"
        WHEN AD.status = 'Do Not Publish'
        THEN 'donotpublish'
        ELSE LOWER(AD.status)
    END                                                     AS status,
    AD.redactionStatus,
    AD.attachmentIds

FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice 	        AS AD
WHERE AD.IsActive = 'Y'

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
view_df = spark.sql('SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_s51_advice')
view_df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable('odw_curated_db.nsip_s51_advice')
